docs.title: Welcome to Pluggedspace Documentation
docs.text: Pluggedspace is a unified platform offering smart SaaS tools designed for startups, agencies, and enterprise teams. This documentation provides everything you need to get started with our ecosystem, use our APIs, and integrate our services into your workflows.

docs.title: 🔍 Overview
docs.text:
Pluggedspace powers a suite of intelligent, scalable tools, including:

  • Monica — AI-powered customer service assistant.
  • DRAC — Data resolution and analytics center.
  • KYC Engine — Identity verification and compliance tool.
  • Bundles & APIs — Unified access, billing, and API management.

Explore how each product works, how to integrate with them, and best practices for deploying them in your organization.

docs.title: 🚀 Getting Started
docs.text:
New to Pluggedspace? Start here:

  • Platform Architecture
  • Authentication & API Keys
  • Using the Portal

docs.title: 📦 Product Documentation
docs.text:
• Monica – Customer Service AI
  • DRAC – Dispute & Data Resolution
  • KYC Engine – Compliance Layer
  • Bundles, Plans & Billing

docs.title: 📘 Resources
docs.text:
• FAQs
  • Glossary
  • Support & Contact

For additional help or questions, visit pluggedspace.org or contact us at support@pluggedspace.org.

Build smart. Build unified. Build with Pluggedspace.

docs.title: 🛠️ Support & Contact
docs.text: Need help with Pluggedspace products or integrations? We’re here for you. Whether you're an end user, a developer, or an agency partner, this page will guide you to the right support channels.

docs.title: 📬 Contact Us
docs.text:
You can reach out to our support team through the following channels:

  • Email: support@pluggedspace.org
  • Live Chat: Available via the Pluggedspace Portal during business hours (Mon–Fri, 9am–6pm WAT)
  • Twitter/X: @pluggedspace
  • GitHub Issues: For technical bugs or documentation issues, use our GitHub issues page

docs.title: 🔧 Troubleshooting Guide
docs.text:
Before contacting support, you might want to:

  1. Check the relevant product documentation.
  2. Visit our FAQs.
  3. Review your API key, tenant configuration, or usage logs from the portal.

docs.title: 🧠 Community & Feedback
docs.text:
We're constantly improving. Help us by sharing your experience:

  • Feature suggestions: Submit Feedback
  • Join our Discord (coming soon!)
  • Report bugs on GitHub

docs.title: 📄 Service-Level Commitments
docs.text:
We aim to respond to all inquiries within:

  • General inquiries: 24–48 business hours
  • API downtime / service outage: Within 2 hours
  • Billing issues: Within 1 business day

Your success is our priority — we’re committed to helping you build and scale with confidence.

If you’re an enterprise client or partner with dedicated support, please contact your account manager directly or use your priority support channel.

docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Welcome to match-bot Documentation
docs.text: For full API reference visit m.pluggedspace.org.

docs.title: Requesting an API Key
docs.text:
To use the match-bot API:

  1. Apply Online
  2. Visit: https://match-bot.com/apply

  3. Fill out the application form with:

    • Name / Organization
    • Intended usage (project or integration)
    • Contact email

  4. Email Request

  5. Send to: access@match-bot.com
  6. Subject: API Access Request
  7. Body: Include your details and intended usage.

Once approved, you will receive: - API Key (unique to your account) - Usage limits - API documentation link

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All API requests must include your API key:

```http Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY

Telegram Bot Usage

Find the bot on Telegram: @matchbot

Commands:

/predict Arsenal vs Manchester United — Predicts the outcome of a specific match.

/nextmatch — Shows the next scheduled match with prediction.

/help — Lists all available commands.

API Endpoints

GET api/

Returns available endpoints and service info.

Example

curl -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" https://api.match-bot.com/api/

POST api/retrain/ (name: retrain_predictions)

Triggers a model retrain. Admin access only.

curl -X POST -H "Authorization: Bearer ADMIN_API_KEY" \ https://api.match-bot.com/api/retrain/

GET api/dashboard/overview/ (name: dashboard_overview)

Returns aggregated prediction stats.

Example Response

{ "total_predictions": 125, "accuracy": 0.82, "average_confidence": 0.74 }

GET api/dashboard/confidence/ (name: dashboard_confidence)

Returns prediction confidence distribution.

Example Response

{ "high_confidence": 58, "medium_confidence": 47, "low_confidence": 20 }

GET api/predictions/latest/ (name: latest_predictions)

Returns the most recent match predictions.

Example

curl -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \ https://api.match-bot.com/api/predictions/latest/

Example Response

[ { "match_id": 987, "home_team": "Arsenal", "away_team": "Manchester United", "predicted_outcome": "Home Win", "predicted_goal_diff": 1.4, "confidence": 0.81 } ]

GET api/dashboard/compare_versions/ (name: compare_versions)

Compares prediction accuracy between model versions.

Example Response

{ "version_1": { "accuracy": 0.78 }, "version_2": { "accuracy": 0.82 } }

GET dashboard/predictions/

Returns prediction data for dashboard visualization.

Example Response

[ { "match": "Liverpool vs Chelsea", "outcome": "Draw", "confidence": 0.66 }, { "match": "Barcelona vs Real Madrid", "outcome": "Away Win", "confidence": 0.72 } ]

Rate Limits

Plan Requests/day Notes

Free 50 Basic access Pro 5,000 Higher limits & priority Enterprise Custom Dedicated support

Support

Email: support@pluggedspace.org

Telegram: @MatchOutcomeBot

Docs: https://api.match-bot.com/docs

    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
